name: separate-by-character
description: "Separates the values in a string by a character given by the user, by default it is separated by commas, and returns a list with the values. Gets rid of the specified character and the first space after each element. If two of the specified character are in a row that means a value of ''."
author: Osbaldo Martinez <osbaldomartineziniguez@gmail.com>
